name: TELETEXT
description:
WELCOME, VIEWER!

WANT TO HAVE YOUR FUTURE FORETOLD? PASS TIME PLAYING GAMES? WIN PRIZES?



WE HAVE IT ALL. AND A BIT MORE, TOO. WHY NOT TAKE A LOOK AT WHAT OUR TELETEXT PROGRAMME HAS TO OFFER DURING YOUR AD BREAK?

List of Features:
  • A reactive world - Your actions will have consequences
  • Multiple Endings
  • Challenging Puzzles
  • Replayability*
  • Breaking the 4th wall**
  • Constant content updates, making the game evolve over time and add new puzzles and story pieces!
  • And a bit of problem solving a real system admin would have to do!***

*Different events can trigger during the game
**Can be disabled
***Real-life IT knowledge isn't required
